name: Raven's Mask
description:
Put on the mask of a Plague Doctor and try to save as many lives possible in a house full of infected, liars, and hard choices.

Raven's Mask is an interactive narrative experience in which you will play as a doctor who penetrates a Black Death quarantine zone to guess the sane people from the infected. As this journey gets darker, you will have to be able to tell the plague's symptoms -or the whole city will perish. If you're not sure about someone's fate you will be able to condemn them, but be careful; for the Hipocratic Oath lays heavy on the Doctor's mind... and you might eventually get crazy.
